markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Potion of Water Breathing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2956)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=672" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 260 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 11 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This filmy, gray potion reeks of ocean detritus and tastes even worse. After drinking this potion, you gain the effects of a 2nd- rank [_water breathing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=370) spell for 1 hour.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Potion of Water Breathing
